list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cut (something) into pieces with repeated sharp blows of an axe or knife.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they chopped up the pulpit for firewood
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ đã cắt nhỏ bục giảng cho củi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: abolish or reduce the size of (something) in a way regarded as ruthless.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: their training courses are to be chopped
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: các khóa đào tạo của họ sẽ được cắt nhỏ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a downward cutting blow or movement, typically with the hand.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an effective chop to the back of the neck
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một chặt hiệu quả về phía sau của cổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thick slice of meat, especially pork or lamb, adjacent to and often including a rib.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he lived on liver or chops
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh sống về gan hoặc sườn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the broken motion of water, typically due to the action of the wind against the tide.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we started our run into a two-foot chop
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi bắt đầu chạy vào chặt hai chân

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a trademark; a brand of goods.
